class.name: GDScriptTrait
class.brief_description: Script resource to store traits for GDScript.
class.description: See [GDScript] or [@GDScript] instead. Script resource to store traits for GDScript created with the [code].gdt[/code] file extension, allows defining and requiring common methods across multiple classes, along with anything that you would see inside of a GDScript class (signals, classes, etc.). [b]Note:[/b] Unlike [GDScript], this resource cannot create instances (see [method GDScript.new]) due to its abstract nature.
